item.title: 001 - Understanding the Timing
item.description: Musicality for Dancers: Understanding the Timing Basics Instructor: 14 RT Agha Introduction This lesson introduces the fundamental concept of ‘Clave’ in salsa music, a musical structure that is essential for building melodies and rhythm patterns. Understanding Clave is crucial for dancers to create and perform choreographies effectively. Understanding Musical Bars in Salsa Definition of a Musical Bar: In salsa, a musical bar consists of four beats. Subdivision of Beats: These four beats can be subdivided further.
